text: Super Castlevania IV, known in Japan as is an adventure platforming video game made by Konami for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. It appeared on the Wii's Virtual Console too. It's a retelling of Castlevania, and the main character is Simon Belmont. title: Super Castlevania IV
